title: MRemoteNG & external tool SCCM
author: epyleptik
body_snippet:
Hi,

I cannot automatically enter the username and password in the SCCM window, has someone figured out how?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43232283/90001416-b566c000-dc91-11ea-99c3-1c26253b13fc.png)


thank you in advance,
